post.title: Marching Band Concert Is Wednesday
post.description:

Hello Band Families!

post.content:
Dear Band Families,

Hello Band Families!

Wednesday, November 1st at 7pm, The Marching Band will be performing their ENTIRE musical season in Gym 1!

Please plan to come, bring your family and enjoy the music one final time… And do not forget to order your CD to enjoy the music for years to come…. The Boosters will be taking orders for both the State Performance DVD and the Marching Band Concert CD at the concert!

After the concert, there will be a dessert reception in Cafeteria 1!

Any questions? Please contact:

Amanda Kost @ 4408646543 or email: memandy@ameritech.net
